124.title: Saga Buu

12451.content:
It has been 6 months since the defeat of Majin Buu. Life has been pretty peaceful.

"But oh man I'm so freaking bored" Kid Trunks said "almost nothing interesting has been happening lately I just wish something change" he thought.

As he made his way outside he saw something odd.

What is this piece of paper doing out here?
12451.title: Kid Trunks

choices: This is so cool I need to test it !
This  sounds kinda dangerous I shouldn't use it unless I need to
124511.content:
'CHANGE NOW’?

As soon as he said those words "w-what.." Information suddenly was just in his head.

"What ? I can swap bodies !" he said "I dunno who is this Ginyu...he certainly fight my father" he thought.

He only looked at the paper but he certainly knew how to change bodies.
Or so something called multi-change.

If he lets out enough energy Trunks can change multiple people bodies with his high level Ki.

What does he say ?
124511.title: Look at it

1245111.content:
"Oh man I wonder when should I use it but where should I go today" he said.

Goten house or Mom lab ?
maybe the beach or downtown at the mall ?
1245111.title: This is so cool I need to test it !

12451111.content:
"It’s been a while since I've seen Goten maybe I can even show this new technique" he said.

It took about 10 minutes to get to his house

"Hey Goten!!" Trunks said it loud.

He suddenly heard a voice

It was Chichi voice, Goten mom.

The door open

"Hello there Trunks what has made you come by ?" she ask.

"Can Goten come outside to play with me" he ask.

"He can't at the moment he’s grounded. Because he sneaked out of the house and not studying."

"Please can he come out.." Trunks said.

"NO!" she yelled.

Trunks thought well this is an opportunity to use that new move.

"But maybe I shouldn't I could convince her some other way" he thought. "Should I come back later...or I change bodies with Goten so he can go outside"
12451111.title: Goten house

124511111.content:
"If I am Goten mom’s then I'm free to say whatever I want to him" he thought

"Hey Chichi look at this!"

"Yes, what is it?" she said.

Trunks body was glowing yellow

"What are you doing Trunks ?!" she yelled in fear.

"Nothing much I just need to be you." Trunks said.

"W-what?!"

'CHANGE NOW’ shouted Trunks as a yellow beam of energy came out of his mouth landing in the mouth of Chichi.

The two souls left their bodies to go to the other body...

It took a few seconds for the light to fade away.

Trunks open her new eyes as she took it in.

Trunks felt such a difference in her whole body that it seemed so much different than in her own Trunks body.

Chichi face then let out a cheeky smile like haha look at this I am the boss now!

"This technique was different than Ginyu" Trunks say with Chichi voice.

What does Chichi say ?
124511111.title: Use Body Change on Chichi

choices: Trunks makes a deal with Chichi
Doesn’t  make a deal and keep Chichi body for the rest of the day
Ask Goten if he wants to switch bodies with Chichi
1245111112.content:
"That’s my body ? Wait...my voice it's not my voice" she said with Trunks voice.

She was starting to take it all in.

She looked at her hands seen them much smaller but they felt much very strong.

She started to look at her body.

She didn't have chest anymore but she had muscles on her now.

Chichi felt she had something between her legs

"Trunks what the hell did you do to me?!"

She was taken a back that Trunks voice come out of her

"W-wait no way.." she said.

Chichi look at her original body and said

"Trunks did you switch bodies ?"

"Yes, I did" Trunks said this with a mocking voice.

"Now I'm free to say Goten is no long grounded, he’s free and I am the boss of this house now."

Chichi replies "Trunks knock this nonsense off Goku is finally coming to visit after a few months today ! I gotta get ready. So give me back my body now !"
1245111112.title: T-that’s my body !

choices: Tells Goku what happened and he understand
Act very nice and kind so he won't think about it or give Chichi back her body
Trunks mess with Goten he say why not staying in that body forever
12451111123.content:
"I think it's time for you to learn what it's like to be a kid again and what it’s like to be Goten." Trunks take Chichi by the ear.

"Come now"

"Ow ow let me go that really hurt !" Chichi said.

Chichi thought "Is this what I do to Goten ?"

"Goten please come out" Trunks say with a sweet voice.

"Yes, mom", Goten comes out of his room to see his mom have Trunks by the ear.

"What’s going on mom ?"

"Goten it’s me Trunks ! I switch bodies with your mom"

"What ?" Goten said being confused.

"It’s true I'm Trunks."

"Ok, tell me what is the secret password if you are Trunks !" Goten said.

"Get stronger every day don't ever stop and chocolate cake is delicious'' Trunks replies.

"N-no way you are Trunks but how are you in my mom's body?"

"I can explain but Goten haven't you ever gotten sick of your mom telling you everything you need to do and how to act ?" he said with a smirk.

"Well yes, why do you ask?" Goten respond.

"How would you like it if you can give her a taste of her own medicine ?"

"What do you mean?"

"You can be in your mom body and your mom would be in your body so she is the one grounded."

Goten was thinking about it for second.

"Goten-chan, you don't actually think about doing it, would you?" Chichi ask hope he says no.

"Ok let's do it Trunks !"

"What! Goten-chan.." Chichi yelled.

"OK so now I can test multiple changes." Trunks thought.

"Ok here I go !"

Chichi body was glowing yellow.

"Goten-chan please I'm sorry being hard on you all the time I just want to make it so you can have a good future !" Chichi pleating to stop it.

But it was too late...

"multiple CHANGE" shouted Trunks as a yellow beam of energy come out the mouths of Chichi Goten and Trunks.

Trunks yellow beam of energy came out of her mouth landing in the mouth of his original body.

Chichi yellow beam of energy came out of his mouth landing in the mouth of Goten.

Goten yellow beam of energy came out of his mouth landing in the mouth of his mom or ChiChi.

The three souls left their bodies to go to the other body...

It took a few seconds for the light to fade away.

Trunks point of view was changed back to normal but his ear hurt.

Goten looks at her new body "That’s felt very different my skin felt so soft"

"Oh, I can't believe it work oh I'm so big !" Goten said with Chichi voice.

"Oh no.." Chichi said now with Goten little boy voice.

She was now in Goten body's.

"Give me back my body now your father comes home today !"

"Well no, you don't have any power now go to your room" Goten said demanding.

"B-but.."

"Go to your room NOW! Goten yelled.

Chichi felt fear at her own voice

"O-ok." She walked to his new room.

"That’s was so freaking amazing Trunks ! But what am I going to do dad coming home what should I do ?" Goten said.
